QuestData.Title: Chief Ukorz Sandscalp
QuestData.Description: Take a good look, mon. Dis is how it goes, betrayal after betrayal. I backstab you for the sword, and den Chief Ukorz go and backstab me even better for it.$B$BThat's life, yah! Or was...$B$BNow, I know you don't got no love for Mazoga. But I know you goin' in der anyway. Kill him for me, mon. Spill more blood on the sand, an' give Chief Ukorz Sandscalp what every one of de Sandfury deserves...a gory death.$B$BMaybe I leave some of my belongin's without a curse before passin' on if you do, yah?
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Kill him good for me, mon.
QuestData.RewardText: He's gone? Did he have the sword?$B$BNah...don't tell me. Don't matter no more. Mazoga don't care.$B$BI'm off now, mon. De consequences of my actions await me. Take whatever I was holdin'... I don't need it where I'm goin'...
